name: Kakaa
greetingText: btw I made this website for you!
wishText: May you always be strong in facing all problems and thank you for everything, I hope you always be happy and healthy, and I hope you can achieve all your dreams and goals.
textInChatBox: happy birthday!!!, best wishes for arriva.
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: I originally said midnight but my coding kept erroring so I just sent it at night. At least if I'm not the first, I can be the last.
replayText: click,if you want to watch it again.
